data.lyric:
[ti:I'll Be Home for Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:The Ultimate Christmas Collection, Vol. 4]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I'll Be Home for Christmas - Bing Crosby (平克·劳斯)
[00:07.77]I'll be home for christmas
[00:14.37]You can plan on me
[00:21.50]Please have snow and mistletoe
[00:28.45]And presents on the tree
[00:37.40]Christmas eve will find me
[00:44.76]Where the lovelight gleams
[00:52.47]I'll be home for christmas
[01:03.32]If only in my dreams
[01:14.91]
[01:16.23]I'll be home for christmas
[01:27.42]You can plan on me
[01:38.13]
[01:38.76]Please have snow and mistletoe
[01:49.70]And presents on the tree
[02:01.26]Christmas eve will find me
[02:12.25]Where the lovelight gleams
[02:23.54]I'll be home for christmas
[02:37.97]If only in my dreams
data.trans:
[ti:I'll Be Home for Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:The Ultimate Christmas Collection, Vol. 4]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.77]我会回家过圣诞节
[00:14.37]你大可放心
[00:21.50]白雪和槲寄生
[00:28.45]还有圣诞树下的礼品
[00:37.40]平安夜会找到我
[00:44.76]在光芒闪耀的爱里
[00:52.47]我会回家过圣诞节
[01:03.32]如果只在我的梦中
[01:14.91]
[01:16.23]我会回家过圣诞节
[01:27.42]你大可放心
[01:38.13]
[01:38.76]白雪和槲寄生
[01:49.70]还有圣诞树下的礼品
[02:01.26]平安夜会找到我
[02:12.25]在光芒闪耀的爱里
[02:23.54]我会回家过圣诞节
[02:37.97]如果只在我的梦中
[02:51.42]
